welcome_message_body: "Welcome to Creil, France! Known for its charming cobblestone streets and rich history, we invite you to explore and immerse yourself in the beauty and culture of our city. Enjoy your stay!"

terminals.name: Terminal 1
terminals.description: The oldest and largest terminal at Charles De Gaulle Airport, serving a variety of international and domestic flights.

terminals.name: Terminal 2
terminals.description: The second largest terminal at Charles De Gaulle Airport, divided into seven sub-terminals and serving primarily international flights.

terminals.name: Terminal 3
terminals.description: The newest and smallest terminal at Charles De Gaulle Airport, primarily serving low-cost airlines and domestic flights.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport, but a premium option is also offered for faster speeds and unlimited access.

terminals.name: Terminal 1
terminals.description: The main terminal at Le Bourget Airport, serving both domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Terminal 2
terminals.description: A smaller terminal used for private and charter flights.

wifi.note: Free wifi is available throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Terminal 1
terminals.description: The main terminal at Beauvais-Tille Airport, serving both domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Terminal 2
terminals.description: A smaller terminal at Beauvais-Tille Airport, primarily used for low-cost airlines.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport, but may be limited in some areas.

terminals.name: Terminal 1
terminals.description: The main terminal at Paris Cergy Pontoise Airport, serving both domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Terminal 2
terminals.description: A smaller terminal at Paris Cergy Pontoise Airport, primarily used for domestic flights.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.
